title: League Maintenance
body:
Okay, seriously Riot you can't keep doing this. force others to log out when you guys need to do maintenance! It's happened too many times where I am in the middle of the game and I start attempting to reconnect because you  have to do maintenance. Let ppl finish their game and force them to log out. Don't make "Play" an option for the 2 hours before you do maintenance its not fair. I'm going to get back on league after wards and I wont have gained any exp or mastery points because you logged me (and the other players) out of our game. Please, FIX THIS. FIND A WAY!
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
